title: Seasonal and circadian rhythms of clerodane diterpenes and glycosylated flavonoids in two varieties of Casearia sylvestris Sw. (Salicaceae)
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Paula C.P. Bueno, Gabriel S. Viana, Livia L. Thomaz, Daniela A. Chagas-Paula, Michael Hippler, Alberto J. Cavalheiro
